languages.text: Статуя древнего воина хранит в себе лучшие черты Азуриани и друкари... И все же она отличается от ксеносов, что наполняют Простор сегодня.

traits.locale_text: [драфт] а это древний эльдар в стренной позе

languages.text: The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.
languages.original_text: Статуя древнего воина хранит в себе лучшие черты Азуриани и друкари... И все же она отличается от ксеносов, что наполняют Простор сегодня.

traits.locale_text: The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.
The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.
The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.
The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.
The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.

languages.text: La statue de ce guerrier antique glorifie les plus nobles traits des Asuryanis et des Drukharis... et pourtant, son apparence est indéniablement différente des xénos qui arpentent aujourd'hui les Étendues de Koronus.
languages.original_text: The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.

traits.locale_text: La statue de ce guerrier antique glorifie les plus nobles traits des Asuryanis et des Drukharis... et pourtant, son apparence est indéniablement différente des xénos qui arpentent aujourd'hui les Étendues de Koronus.

languages.text: この古代の戦士の像には、アシュリヤーニとデュカーリの最も優れた特徴が刻まれている…しかし、現在コロヌス・エクスパンスを徘徊する異種族とは紛れもなく異なっている。
languages.original_text: The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.

traits.locale_text: この古代の戦士の像には、アシュリヤーニとデュカーリの最も優れた特徴が刻まれている…しかし、現在コロヌス・エクスパンスを徘徊する異種族とは紛れもなく異なっている。

languages.text: 这尊古代战士的雕像，带着方舟灵族与黑暗灵族最突出的特点……然而，他的相貌与如今游荡在科罗努斯扩区的异形截然不同。
languages.original_text: The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.

traits.locale_text: 这尊古代战士的雕像，带着方舟灵族与黑暗灵族最突出的特点……然而，他的相貌与如今游荡在科罗努斯扩区的异形截然不同。

languages.text: Die besten Züge der Asuryani und der Drukhari sind in dieser Statue eines antiken Kriegers verewigt ... und doch unterscheidet sie sich ganz deutlich von den Xenos, die heute durch die Koronus-Ausdehnung streifen.
languages.original_text: The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.

traits.locale_text: Die besten Züge der Asuryani und der Drukhari sind in dieser Statue eines antiken Kriegers verewigt ... und doch unterscheidet sie sich ganz deutlich von den Xenos, die heute durch die Koronus-Ausdehnung streifen.

languages.text: Los mejores atributos de los Asuryani y los Drukhari se recrean en esta estatua de un antiguo guerrero... y sin embargo es inconfundiblemente distinta a los xenos que vagan hoy en día por la Extensión de Koronus.
languages.original_text: The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.

traits.locale_text: Los mejores atributos de los Asuryani y los Drukhari se recrean en esta estatua de un antiguo guerrero... y sin embargo es inconfundiblemente distinta a los xenos que vagan hoy en día por la Extensión de Koronus.

languages.text: Asuryaniler ve Drukharilerin güzellikleri, bu kadim savaşçı heykelinde saklanmış. Bugünlerde Koronus Enginliği'nde kol gezen zenolardan farklı olduğu bariz.
languages.original_text: The best features of the Asuryani and the Drukhari are preserved in this statue of an ancient warrior... and yet it is unmistakably different from the xenos that roam the Koronus Expanse today.

traits.locale_text: Asuryani ve Drukharilerin en güzel yanları, bu kadim savaşçı heykelinde muhafaza edilmiş... Ancak bugünlerde Koronus Enginliği'nde kol gezen zenolardan farklı olduğu da bariz.
